pr_title: Compress Singleton Service responses to improve UI performance

timeline.bodyText:
It's better set this to 2048. When size is small, it's unnecessary to compress. Perhaps size will increase after compression.
Suggest extract the 2 parameters - "on" and 1 - as configuration parameters, users can set parameters on their own needs.
timeline.author: Xiaochao8

timeline.message: Merge remote-tracking branch upstream/master into gzip
